text:
e="preserve">Stephen Crawford Young Jr. (born 11 December 1956) is a Scottish musician. He is the rhythm guitarist and backing vocalist for the Australian hard rock band DC. He officially joined the band in September 2014. He replaced his uncle, Malcolm Young who retired due to dementia. He had also filled in for Malcolm during AC/DC's 1988 US tour.
Young was born in Glasgow. In 1963, he moved with his family to Australia. He returned to Scotland in 1970.
